text: Yevgeni Nikolayevich Nazarov (; born 7 April 1997) is a Russian football player. He plays in the Czech Republic for FK Teplice on loan from FC Krasnodar. ==Club career== He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Krasnodar-2 on 29 July 2016 in a game against FC Sochi. He made his Russian Football National League debut for Krasnodar-2 on 8 August 2018 in a game against FC Tambov. On 14 June 2019, he joined Czech club FK Teplice on loan. ==References== ==External links== * * * Profile by Russian Professional Football League Category:1997 births Category:People from Neftekumsky District Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Russia under-21 international footballers Category:FC Krasnodar players Category:FK Teplice players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic Category:Czech First League players Category:Sportspeople from Stavropol Krai
title: Yevgeni Nazarov
